mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.5 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Pathfinder Adventures - Epic and Legendary Cards 1

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Pathfinder Adventures - Epic and Legendary Cards 1 - $4.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Pathfinder Adventures - Epic and Legendary Cards 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: Contains over 40 Legendary and 60 Epic rarity Treasure cards 3 Legendary Edge dice.
